title: Why China's Belt and Road Plan Is the Best Way to Lift the Global Economy
text: BEIJING -- The much-talked-about " Belt and Road Initiative " has been gaining attention ever since it was first proposed by President Xi Jinping of China in 2013. So has the recent birth of the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank and the
